item.title: Jason add a quote by Fernando A. Flores
item.description: "Halfway through the set, the lead singer, who goes by Cloud, knife in hand, begins to stab at the cutout of Copal Brandt with a lion's passion. Out of nowhere blood is produced and Cloud proceeds to rub it all over his own face and body, then on his own bandmates. Afterwards he roars into the microphone, 'Do you know why we're doing this, McAllen? We're doing this FOR NO PARTICULAR REASON!!!!!!!!!" -- Fernando A. Flores

item.title: Jason add a quote by Mark R. Brand
item.description: "For every guy who loves being a dad, there’s another who realizes too late that he’s created something his wife loves more than him." -- Mark R. Brand

item.title: Jason add a quote by Kevin Haworth
item.description: "In the Catskills, nostalgia runs backwards. The upwardly mobile Jewish masses of the 1950s and 1960s have been replaced by the Jews of 19th century Poland." -- Kevin Haworth

item.title: Jason add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "First they ignore you, then they ridicule you, then they fight you, and then you win." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Jason add a quote by Ben Tanzer
item.description: "The bigger you feel things, the more curious you are; and the more problems you want to solve and not actually run from, the better everything is, even the things you already love." -- Ben Tanzer

item.title: Jason add a quote by Jello Biafra
item.description: "Don't hate the media; become the media." -- Jello Biafra

item.title: Jason add a quote by John Kennedy Toole
item.description: "Is my paranoia getting completely out of hand, or are you mongoloids really talking about me?" -- John Kennedy Toole

item.title: Jason add a quote by Philip Roth
item.description: "Good Christ, a Jewish man with parents alive is a fifteen-year-old boy, and will remain a fifteen-year-old boy till they die!" -- Philip Roth

item.title: Jason add a quote by Robert A. Heinlein
item.description: "Support for the arts -- merde! A government-supported artist is an incompetent whore!" -- Robert A. Heinlein

item.title: Jason add a quote by Danger Slater
